title: VTS Kit Angular Schematic
description: Creates a new, generic interface definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the interface file, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder. Default mode is set to `libs`
path.x-prompt: Where to create new interface, relative to 'shared' or 'libs' folder (default set to create 'libs' interface, use option --shared to create shared interface)?

name.description: The name of the new interface.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the interface?

shared.description: Specifies whether to create shared service.

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".
